name: Ferrothorn
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: It fights by swinging around its three spiky feelers. A hit from these steel spikes can reduce a boulder to rubble.

attacks.name: Iron Defense
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn.

attacks.name: Power Whip
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
